data.title: Welcome to the City of Darlington, South Carolina
data.meta_description: City of Darlington Welcomes You! A city full of rich history, the annual SC Sweet Potato Festival and the Darlington Raceway! Discover Darlington!
data.meta_site_name: The City of Darlington, South Carolina
data.text:

Welcome to The City of Darlington!

Check out what’s going on in our city!

Hurricane Debby Storm Center

IMPORTANT CONTACT INFORMATION: In the event of an emergency, dial 911. Fire Department: (843) 398-4013 Police Central Dispatch: (843) 398-4920 Report downed trees and road obstacles (washouts, sinkholes, etc.): dial

Read more

Fire Safe Community

For the first time in its history, the City of Darlington has been named a “Fire Safe Community” thanks to the Darlington Fire Department’s successful implementation and completion of the Fire Safe South Carolina program.

Read more

City of Darlington Jobs

CURRENT JOB OFFERINGS: City Manager, Water & Sewer Maintenance Technician Senior, Public Works Clerical & Utility, City Firefighter II & Police Department Patrol Officers

Read more

Welcome to The City of Darlington!

Check out what’s going on in our city!

City Receives Hurricane Idalia FEMA Funding

The City of Darlington recently received a $124,764.02 FEMA grant for the damage Tropical Storm Idalia left behind during the 2023 hurricane season.

Read more

Fire Safe Community

For the first time in its history, the City of Darlington has been named a “Fire Safe Community” thanks to the Darlington Fire Department’s successful implementation and completion of the Fire Safe South Carolina program.

UPCOMING EVENTS

National Night Out

Join the Darlington Police Department and other City organizations for National Night Out!

Read more

Darlington City Council Regular Meeting

Darlington City Council Meeting: City Council meets @ 6 p.m. on the first Tuesday of the month except when Holidays fall and schedule is amended.

Read more

Track Laps for Charity

Track Laps for Charity will be held August 28, 2024 from 6 p.m. – 7:30 p.m. where you can drive your own car around the track Too Tough To Tame for 3 laps.

Read more

Terrence Carraway Memorial 5K

Run or walk around the track Too Tough To Tame in memory of Florence Police Officer, Sgt. Terrence F. Carraway.

Read more

Darlington Raceway Hauler Parade

It’s RACE TIME!!! Line up at the Square to see the haulers make their way through Darlington, as Race weekend begins!

Read more
